mapper.select:
SELECT u.* FROM user u WHERE u.account = '${account}' AND u.password = '${password}'
AND u.wechatUnionId ='${unionid}'

SELECT u.*, a.`name` as agent_name, IFNULL(install_task.install_task_count,0) AS install_task_count, IFNULL(maintain_task.maintain_task_count,0) AS maintain_task_count, IFNULL(repair_task.repair_task_count,0) AS repair_task_count,
CONCAT(IFNULL(install_task.install_task_count,0)+IFNULL(maintain_task.maintain_task_count,0)+IFNULL(repair_task.repair_task_count,0)) as total_task_count FROM `user` AS u LEFT JOIN agent a ON a.id = u.agent LEFT JOIN (SELECT count(*) as install_task_count, u.`name`, im.user_id FROM install_members im LEFT JOIN install_record ir on im.install_record_id=ir.id LEFT JOIN `user` u on u.id=im.user_id WHERE ir.install_status < 4 AND ir.install_status > 1 GROUP BY im.user_id ) as install_task ON u.id=install_task.user_id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT count(*) as maintain_task_count, u.name, mm.user_id FROM maintain_members mm LEFT JOIN maintain_record mr on mm.maintain_record_id=mr.id LEFT JOIN `user` u on u.id=mm.user_id WHERE mr.maintain_status < 4 AND mr.maintain_status > 1 GROUP BY mm.user_id ) as maintain_task ON u.id=maintain_task.user_id
LEFT JOIN (SELECT count(*) as repair_task_count, u.`name`, rm.user_id FROM repair_members rm LEFT JOIN repair_record rr on rm.repair_record_id=rr.id LEFT JOIN `user` u on u.id=rm.user_id WHERE rr.`status` < 8 AND rr.`status`> 2 GROUP BY rm.user_id ) as repair_task ON u.id=repair_task.user_id
WHERE 1=1 AND u.role_id=3
AND u.agent = #{agentId}
and u.valid = '1'
